extendedInfo.description: Let's start to Catch It! Guide the bucket to catch the cute drops by simply tilting your Android phone!Play this a classic drop game with HD graphical and gameplay enhancements for FREE!!Catch The Dwindling Drops is a simple, yet extremely addictive game that will test your game performance and brain strategy.. It's HD graphics and realistic water drops with different visual effects such as the beautiful sea, bird flying in the sky, eye pleasing greenery, the overlay of drops and many other features gives a enchanting look. If you like egg games or water themed games then you must give a try. Helpful tips are featured throughout gameplay to assist the player in case of any confusion.How to Play:Once the game starts you have to collect the blue drops to gain points. Each blue drop will make you rich by 10 points. Try to avoid catching fiery drops and stone as fiery drop will deduct your 10 points and stone will deduct your one life. You can move bucket from right to left or vice versa. To move the bucket you only have to tilt your Android mobile.Game includes three exciting levels. As you get into the next level, drops and stones will start falling down more frequently in order to significantly increase the difficulty level.Collect more blue drops to get more points! Try to beat the best score in the world.No internet connection is required which enables you to have fun through this enjoyable game anytime and anywhere.*************************************************Multiple features that will catch your imagination:1. User friendly as controls are very simple, you only have to tilt your Android mobile to catch the beautiful blue drops.2. Only the most skilled players will master the Catch the dwindling drops.3. High contrast color scheme so that small screen devices with low resolutions can easily see what's on the screen.4. Simple and easy to play but involves a good mind and hand control exercise.5. Drops falling, with a beautiful live nature picture is really eye pleasing ! 6. No registration required, you can play right away! And it's free too!*************************************************The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. The wallpaper is not designed for tablets and Samsung galaxy Note. It is designed for these resolutions: 240*320, 320*480, 480*854, 480*800. Now no more siri is required to answer your smple love query , it can be done through this app only..Try many tricks to earn loads of blue drops and collect lots of drops to level up. Each time you'll play, you'll challenge yourself for higher score.The controls are very simple and user friendly! game gives a thrilling ride while being very addictive!  Tags: Free games, Fun games, Free entertainment, Casual games, Bubble drop game, rain drops, water drops, ice.
